markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Server](/NPCs.aspx?ID=943)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Always on the move from patron to patron, servers are the backbone of any tavern or eatery. Their work hones both their agility and their diplomacy.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Server](/NPCs.aspx?ID=943)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 238</row>

**Perception** +3

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +4, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[pewter mug](/Equipment.aspx?ID=36), serving tray

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 7

**Quick Catch** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An object that the server could hold in one hand is dropped within the server's reach; **Requirements** The server has at least one hand free; **Effect** The server catches the dropped object before it hits the floor or leaves their reach.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pewter mug +6 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-194" />
name: Server
